thread.title: Kenya: Work Faster On Isiolo Airport, Dp Ruto Says
thread.title_full: Kenya: Work Faster On Isiolo Airport, Dp Ruto Says

title: Kenya: Work Faster On Isiolo Airport, Dp Ruto Says
text:
Kenya: State Told to Increase Teachers' Pay 
Isiolo Governor Godana Doyo said the commissioning of the airport will complement other infrastructure development in the region that includes the Lapsset corridor. 
Ruto said Isiolo has been identified as a resort city and will be a full-fledged export processing zone, especially for livestock products and agriculture. 
"I urge each of you to venture into business and other development work to realise your dreams," he said. 
Ruto praised the county government for effectively implementing devolution. 
He said the new export standard slaughterhouse in Isiolo will meet the demands of pastoral communities. 
Isiolo South MP Abdulah Banticha, women's representative Tiya Galgalo, area MP Joseph Samal and Nominated Senator Fatuma Dullo were at the meeting. 
Doyo praised the DP for focusing on developing northern Kenya. 
He said the airport will help in transport of livestock and farm products and will improve tourism. 
Isiolo International Airport is being upgraded at a cost of Sh900 million. Kenya
